title: [Test] Allowing import Testcase for Unit testing Custom Autograd Functions
body_html:
Hi !

When developing custom Autograd Function one cannot use default unittest.TestCase.assertEqual functions to check for equality between tensors.

Therefore it would be nice to be able to use your TestCase class by adding and init file in the folder or to move the common file elsewhere

Kind regards

body:
Hi ! 

When developing custom Autograd Function one cannot use default unittest.TestCase.assertEqual functions to check for equality between tensors. 

Therefore it would be nice to be able to use your TestCase class by adding and __init__ file in the folder or to move the common file elsewhere

Kind regards
